name: ignition
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C usually singular ] the electrical system in an engine that causes the fuel to burn or explode in order to start the engine: the ignition Switch/Turn the ignition on. an ignition key
[ U ] formal the act or process of something starting to burn

the act of starting to burn
An engine’s ignition is the electrical system that starts the engine.
